title: Drawing, "Reliquary of White Marble", ca. 1825
medium:
Pen and black ink, watercolor, over graphite, ruled border in pen and brown
Support: light blue laid paper laid down on white paper
markings: Marks: (sheet): escutcheon with horn above crown (RB '45) (mount): Strasburg bend and lily (RB '45)
inscribed: in graphite, verso: Page 5 / leave paper
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Reliquary of White Marble", ca. 1825.
ca. 1825. Pen and black ink, watercolor, over graphite, ruled border in pen and brown
Support: light blue laid paper laid down on white paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-607.
